page.title: 13FARMING SAMPLE STUDIES
page.content: Cont. from page 12 Date of study: 10th July 1985 This is a working farm and there has been a farm on this site for over a hundred years.The owner of the farm is Mr. Attwood and his family have farmed here for 31 years.The farm-house is the original one and it is built of local sandstone with a flagstone roof. It has a large cellar which in the past was used for curing ham and bacon.Near the farm-house there is a cow house,farrowing house,piggery,2 pig sties,granary with loose boxes for cattle underneath,3 seperate loose boxes for cattle,potato store,3 barns, and a store shed with tractor diesel tanks over the top. Most of these buildings are the same age as the farm-house but the barns have been built from 1964 onwards.The older buildings are built from the same
